name: Ilmatar crane
description: Ilmatar is an overhead crane located at Aalto University.

features.name: OSEMA
features.description: OSEMA allows managing retrofitted sensors attached to the crane.

features.name: MindSphere
features.description: MindSphere stores historical data of the crane
features.requirement: User account for the aiicd1 tenant is required.

features.name: OPC UA
features.description: OPC UA server allows real-time monitoring and control of the crane
features.requirement: Access to Ilmatar local network, details available on request.

features.name: GraphQL Interface
features.description: This interface allows accessing OPC UA using GraphQL
features.requirement: Access to Ilmatar local network, details available on request.

features.name: Teamcenter
features.description: Teamcenter stores PLM data of the crane. Includes 3D model of the crane without business criticial parts

features.name: Ilmatar OIE
features.description: The website of Ilmatar OIE provides human readable information about the crane.
